title: "KIT Researchers Artificial Neural Networks To Localize Extrasystoles"
excerpt: "Additional heartbeats from cardiac chambers, so-called ventricular extrasystoles, may be associated with severe diseases. Researchers at Karlsruhe Institute of Technology (KIT) use machine learning for their non-invasive localization."
